inclusion.criterion: Patient is a pregnant woman between 18 and 45 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Confirmed diagnosis of severe or extremely severe left, right or bilateral CDH of the fetus
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Severe CDH: -Fetal liver herniated into the hemithorax -Lung-head ratio (LHR) is less than or equal to 1.0 calculated between 27+0/7 and 29+6/7 weeks' gestation
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Extremely Severe CDH: -At least 1/3rd of the liver parenchyma herniated into the thoracic cavity -Lung-head ratio (LHR) is < 0.71 calculated between 22+0/7 and 29+6/7 weeks' gestation
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Normal fetal echocardiogram or echocardiogram with a minor anomaly (such a small VSD) that in the opinion of the pediatric cardiologist will not affect postnatal outcome
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The mother must be healthy enough to have surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient provides signed informed consent that details the maternal and fetal risks involved with the procedure
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient willing to remain in Houston for the duration following the balloon placement until delivery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to abdominal surgery, fetoscopic surgery, or general anesthesia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy or previous adverse reaction to a study medication specified in this protocol
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Preterm labor, preeclampsia, or uterine anomaly (e.g., large fibroid tumor)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Fetal aneuploidy, known structural genomic variants, other major fetal anomalies, or known syndromic mutation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Suspicion of major recognized syndrome (e.g. Fryns syndrome) on ultrasound or MRI
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 16-year-old girl with Hashimoto disease, complaining of weight gain and abnormal menstrual cycles. She has high TSH levels and low free T4 levels.
